roleset.name: ignoring, not taking care of

example.name: all args
example.text: He held the British and their Hashemite collaborators in contempt for what he felt to be their economic neglect of Jordan during the Mandate period...

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, WordNet, neglect-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls neglect-75-1-1.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Most of these people are charged with animal abuse and neglect and they are fined and jailed .
